3600.name: The Great Chessboard Of Midgaard
3600.description:
The area opens in the archway of the Chessboard of Midgaard. The giant
wooden gate is rusted open. A narrow dirt path leads eastwards into the
thick grass and the chessboard opens up to the west. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

east.description: A dirt path leads away through the great field north of Midgaard.

west.description: The huge chessboard opens up to the west.

3601.name: A White Square
3601.description:
This area is a white marble square. This is usually the home of the
Black Queen's Rook. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of
city life echo around.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

3602.name: A Black Square
3602.description:
This area is a black marble square. This is usually the home of the
Black Queen's Knight. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3616.name: A White Square
3616.description:
This area is a white marble square. This is usually the home of one of
the Black King's Pawns. The sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

3617.name: A White Square
3617.description:
The area opens upon a gleaming white marble square. The polished stone
reflects an ethereal glow, and the air shimmers with magical energy.
Across the board, Visible is towering chess pieces locked in eternal
battle. Buildings crowd together on all sides. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

3618.name: A Black Square
3618.description:
This black obsidian square absorbs the light around it. The dark stone
feels cold beneath your feet, and shadows seem to pool at the edges.
Giant chess pieces loom in the distance. The sounds of city life echo
around. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3619.name: A White Square
3619.description:
Pristine white marble stretches beneath you, almost blinding in its
brightness. The square pulses with faint magical luminescence, part of
the grand chessboard's enchantment. Buildings crowd together on all
sides. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3620.name: A Black Square
3620.description:
Deep black stone forms this square, polished to a mirror-like finish.
The obsidian feels unnaturally cold, and you can hear the distant
grinding of massive chess pieces moving across the board. Buildings
crowd together on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3621.name: A White Square
3621.description:
This white square gleams like fresh snow under an invisible sun. Magical
runes are etched along its edges, part of the ancient game's binding
spell. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The sounds of
city life echo around.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3622.name: A Black Square
3622.description:
Jet-black obsidian forms this square, darker than night. The stone seems
to whisper with ancient magic, and your footsteps echo strangely across
its surface. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city
life echo around.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3623.name: A White Square
3623.description:
Brilliant white marble radiates a subtle warmth. This square sits at a
strategic position on the mystical chessboard, and you sense powerful
pieces have stood here. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3624.name: A Black Square
3624.description:
This area is a black marble square. Visible is a rusty gate to the
south. The sounds of city life echo around. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3625.name: A Black Square
3625.description:
Darkness pools on this black square, the obsidian drinking in all light.
Faint energy pulses beneath your feet, part of the board's eternal
enchantment. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors
and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

3626.name: A White Square
3626.description:
Ivory-white stone gleams beneath you, immaculately smooth. The square
feels charged with anticipation, as if waiting for the next move in an
endless game. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3627.name: A Black Square
3627.description:
This black square feels heavier than the others, as if weighted with
importance. The obsidian is flawless, reflecting distorted images of the
towering chess pieces. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3628.name: A White Square
3628.description:
Pure white marble forms this square, unblemished and bright. Magical
energy crackles faintly at the edges where white meets black across the
board. The sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3629.name: A Black Square
3629.description:
Coal-black stone stretches beneath you, cold and unyielding. The square
seems to absorb sound as well as light, creating an eerie pocket of
silence. Buildings crowd together on all sides. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3630.name: A White Square
3630.description:
This white square practically glows with inner light. The marble feels
ancient beyond measure, worn smooth by centuries of magical combat
above. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city life echo
around.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3631.name: A Black Square
3631.description:
This area is a black marble square. There is a rusty gate a short
distance to the east. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3632.name: A White Square
3632.description:
This area is a white marble square. There is a large rusty gate to the
east. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: The gate to the chessboard is just to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3633.name: A White Square
3633.description:
Gleaming white marble forms this square near the board's edge. The stone
is cool to the touch, and you can sense the boundary of the magical
playing field nearby. The sounds of city life echo around. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

3634.name: A Black Square
3634.description:
Obsidian black as a moonless night forms this square. Strange
reflections dance across its surface, showing glimpses of moves long
past in this eternal game. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3635.name: A White Square
3635.description:
Brilliant white stone radiates subtle power. This square occupies a
tactical position, and faint scorch marks suggest it's seen magical
combat. The sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3636.name: A Black Square
3636.description:
Deep black obsidian forms this square, its surface polished to
perfection. The stone seems to hum with barely contained magical energy.
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3637.name: A White Square
3637.description:
This white square shimmers with protective enchantments. The marble
feels solid and reassuring, a bastion of light against the surrounding
darkness. Buildings crowd together on all sides. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3638.name: A Black Square
3638.description:
Darkness incarnate forms this black square. The obsidian is so perfectly
black it's difficult to gauge depth, creating a subtle sense of vertigo.
The sounds of city life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3639.name: A White Square
3639.description:
Pristine white marble stretches in a perfect square. Ancient runes
carved into its edges glow faintly, maintaining the board's magical
integrity. The sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3640.name: A Black Square
3640.description:
This area is a black marble square. There is a rusty gate to the north.
The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of city
life echo around.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3641.name: A Black Square
3641.description:
This black square feels different from the others - colder, darker, more
ominous. The obsidian seems to pull at you slightly, as if gravity is
stronger here. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The cobblestones
are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

3642.name: A White Square
3642.description:
Radiant white marble forms this square, almost painful to look at in its
brightness. The stone vibrates with barely perceptible magical energy.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3643.name: A Black Square
3643.description:
Black as the void between stars, this obsidian square seems to exist
slightly out of phase with reality. Your footsteps make no sound upon
it. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3644.name: A White Square
3644.description:
This white square gleams like polished bone. The marble is ancient yet
eternal, part of a game that transcends normal time and space. Buildings
crowd together on all sides. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3645.name: A Black Square
3645.description:
Jet-black stone forms this square, its surface mirror-smooth. Dark
reflections show distorted versions of yourself, twisted by the board's
magic. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3646.name: A White Square
3646.description:
Pure white marble radiates a comforting warmth. This square feels safe,
protected by the same magic that maintains the entire chessboard realm.
The sounds of city life echo around. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

east.description: A black square lies to the east.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3647.name: A Black Square
3647.description:
Obsidian darker than shadows forms this square. The black stone seems to
swallow light and sound, creating a pocket of profound silence and
darkness. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: A white square lies to the north.

east.description: A white square lies to the east.

south.description: A white square lies to the south.

west.description: A white square lies to the west.

3648.name: A White Square
3648.description:
This white square marks the edge of the board. The marble transitions
into nothingness beyond, where the magical playing field ends and
reality resumes. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: A black square lies to the north.

south.description: A black square lies to the south.

west.description: A black square lies to the west.

3665.name: The Black Treasury
3665.description:
This is the treasury of the Black Court. Hopefully no one has looted the
Crown's treasure. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still
and musty.

up.description: A small staircase rises above you.

3666.name: The White Treasury
3666.description:
This is the treasury of the White Court. Hopefully no one has looted the
Crown's treasure. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch.

up.description: A small staircase rises above you.

3600.name: black
3600.short_desc: the Pawn of the Black Court
3600.long_desc: You see a pawn standing here waiting for orders.
3600.description:
The Black Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed.
His armor is shiny and black.  He stands ready to give his life for the
Crown.

3601.name: white
3601.short_desc: the Pawn of the White Court
3601.long_desc: You see a pawn standing here waiting for orders.
3601.description:
The White Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed.
His armor is spotless and white.  He stands ready to give his life for the
Crown.

3602.name: black
3602.long_desc: In the corner you see a large, black, stone castle on wheels.
3602.description:
The Black Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels.  Just
from the looks of it, it will probably be YOUR tomb.

3603.name: white
3603.long_desc: In the corner you see a large, white, stone castle on wheels.
3603.description:
The White Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels.  Just
from the looks of it, it will probably be YOUR tomb.

3604.name: black
3604.long_desc: Here stands a magnificent knight of the dark realm.
3604.description:
The Black Knight is here, riding his ebony black war horse.  His eyes
flash behind his visor in vengence.

3605.name: white
3605.long_desc: Here stands a magnificent knight of the light realm.
3605.description:
The White Knight is here, riding his ivory white war horse.  His eyes
gleam behind his visor in joy.

3606.name: black
3606.description:
The Black Bishop seems willing to help you straight into your grave so
he can bless you properly.

3607.name: white
3607.description:
The White Bishop seems willing to help you in any possible so that he can
attain a higher spirituality.

3608.name: black
3608.description:
The Black Queen is a strikingly beautiful woman with pale skin and a
mass of dark hair that crowns her head like a black cloud.  If looks
could kill, you would already be dead.

3609.name: white
3609.description:
The White Queen is a stunningly beautiful woman with dark skin and a mass
of light hair that frames her head like the sun.  This is surely love at
first sight for you.

3610.name: black
3610.description:
The Black King is a menacing figure.  You can easily understand why he
is the king and you are not.

3611.name: white
3611.description:
The White King is a stately figure.  You can easily understand why he
is the king and you are not.

3600.name: armour
3600.room_desc: A pile of black armour is here.

3601.name: armour
3601.room_desc: A pile of white armour is here.

3602.name: sword
3602.room_desc: The sword of a Black Pawn lies here.

3603.name: sword
3603.room_desc: The sword of a White Pawn lies here.

3604.name: armour
3604.room_desc: Some armour made from the remains of a black rook lies heaped on the floor.

3605.name: armour
3605.room_desc: Some armour made from the remains of a white rook lies heaped on the floor.

3606.name: lance
3606.short_desc: the Lance of the Black Knight
3606.room_desc: The Lance of the Black Knight lies here, waiting to rust.

3607.name: lance
3607.short_desc: the Lance of the White Knight
3607.room_desc: The Lance of the White Knight lies here, waiting to rust.

3608.name: staff
3608.short_desc: the Staff of the Black Bishop
3608.room_desc: The Black Bishop's Staff is lying here.

3609.name: staff
3609.short_desc: the Staff of the White Bishop
3609.room_desc: The White Bishop's Staff is lying here.

3610.name: crown
3610.short_desc: the Crown of the Black Queen
3610.room_desc: The Crown of the Black Queen lies here, looking neglected.

3611.name: crown
3611.short_desc: the Crown of the White Queen
3611.room_desc: The Crown of the White Queen lies here, looking neglected.

3612.name: sceptre
3612.room_desc: The Sceptre of the Black King lies here, collecting dust.

3613.name: sceptre
3613.room_desc: The Sceptre of the White King lies here, collecting dust.

3614.name: key
3614.short_desc: The Key to the Black Treasury
3614.room_desc: There is a sinister black key lying here.

3615.name: key
3615.short_desc: the Key to the White Treasury
3615.room_desc: There is a bright white key lying here.

3616.name: coins
3616.room_desc: There are a LOT of coins here.

3617.name: coins
3617.room_desc: There are a LOT of coins here.
